points.title: Points
points.description: Point cost of the trait. Positive values cost points and negative values give points

intimidate.title: Intimidate
intimidate.description: The amount of intimidate to modify

persuade.title: persuade
persuade.description: The amount of persuade to modify

lie.title: lie
lie.description: The amount of lie to modify

threshold.title: threshold
threshold.description: True if this is a threshold.

purifiable.title: Purifiable
purifiable.description: Sets if the mutation be purified (default: true)

prereqs.title: prerequisites
prereqs.description: Needs these mutations before you can mutate toward this mutation

initial_ma_styles.title: Initial martial arts styles
initial_ma_styles.description: (optional) A list of ids of martial art styles of which the player can choose one when starting a game.

prereqs2.title: prerequisites 2
prereqs2.description: Also need these mutations before you can mutate towards this mutation. When both set creates 2 different mutation paths, random from one is picked. Only use together with "prereqs"

types.title: types
types.description: The ID of a JSON entry of type mutation_type

leads_to.title: Leads To
leads_to.description: Mutations that add to this one

changes_to.title: Changes to
changes_to.description: Can change into these mutations when mutating further

threshreq.title: threshreq
threshreq.description: Required threshold for this mutation to be possible

passive_mods.title: Passive Mods
passive_mods.description: increases stats with the listed value. Negative means a stat reduction

int_mod.title: Intelligence Mod
int_mod.description: The amount of intelligence to modify

per_mod.title: Perception Mod
per_mod.description: The amount of perception to modify

str_mod.title: Strength Mod
str_mod.description: The amount of strength to modify

dex_mod.title: Dexterity Mod
dex_mod.description: The amount of dexterity to modify

visibility.title: Visibility
visibility.description: Visibility of the trait for purposes of NPC interaction (default: 0)

ugliness.title: Ugliness
ugliness.description: Ugliness of the trait for purposes of NPC interaction (default: 0)

mixed_effect.title: Mixed Effect
mixed_effect.description: Whether the trait has both positive and negative effects. This is purely declarative and is only used for the user interface. (default: false)

profession.title: Profession
profession.description: Trait is a starting profession special trait. (default: false)

good.title: good
good.description: Good increases pos and cancels neg,

ignored.title: ignored
ignored.description: ignored cancels both good and neutral

restricts_gear.title: Restricts Gear
restricts_gear.description: list of bodyparts that get restricted by this mutation

armor.title: Armor
armor.description: Protects selected body parts this much.

oneOf.title: Single
oneOf.description: Applies resistance to these body part

items.title: Part
items.description: Applies resistance to these body parts

active.title: Active
active.description: When set the mutation is an active mutation that the player needs to activate (default: false)

cost.title: Cost
cost.description: Cost to activate this mutation. Needs one of the hunger, thirst, or fatigue values set to true. (default: 0)

bodytemp_sleep.title: bodytemp_sleep
bodytemp_sleep.description: Additional units of bodytemp which are applied when sleeping

time.title: Time
time.description: Sets the amount of (turns * current player speed ) time units that need to pass before the cost is to be paid again. Needs to be higher than one to have any effect. (default: 0)

fatigue.title: Fatigue
fatigue.description: If true, activated mutation increases fatigue by cost. (default: false)

hunger.title: Hunger
hunger.description: If true, activated mutation increases hunger by cost. (default: false)

thirst.title: Thirst
thirst.description: If true, activated mutation increases thirst by cost. (default: false)

vitamins_absorb_multi.title: Vitamins Absorb Multi
vitamins_absorb_multi.description: multiplier of vitamin absorption based on material. "all" is every material. supports multiple materials.

hearing_modifier.title: hearing modifier
hearing_modifier.description: Multiplies your hearing by this much

noise_modifier.title: hearing modifier
noise_modifier.description: Multiplies your noise by this much

encumbrance_always.title: Encumbrance Always
encumbrance_always.description: Adds this much encumbrance to selected body parts

encumbrance_covered.title: Encumbrance Covered
encumbrance_covered.description: Adds this much encumbrance to selected body parts

items.title: Bodypart
items.description: The body part to add encumbrance

bodytemp_modifiers.title: bodytemp modifiers
bodytemp_modifiers.description: Range of additional bodytemp units (these units are described in 'weather.h'. First value is used if the person is already overheated, second one if it's not.

fatigue_modifier.title: Fatigue Modifier
fatigue_modifier.description: Extra fatigue rate multiplier. 1.0 doubles usage, -0.5 halves.

dodge_modifier.title: Dodge Modifier
dodge_modifier.description: Add this much to your dodge skill. A negative will subtract it.

fatigue_regen_modifier.title: Fatigue regen Modifier
fatigue_regen_modifier.description: Modifier for the rate at which fatigue and sleep deprivation drops when resting.

metabolism_modifier.title: Metabolism modifier
metabolism_modifier.description: Extra metabolism rate multiplier. 1.0 doubles usage, -0.5 halves.

healing_awake.title: Healing awake
healing_awake.description: Healing rate per turn while awake.

healing_resting.title: Healing resting
healing_resting.description: Healing rate per turn while resting.

weight_capacity_modifier.title: Weight Capacity Modifier
weight_capacity_modifier.description: (Optional, default = 1) Factor modifying base weight carrying capacity.

ranged_mutation.title: Ranged Mutation
ranged_mutation.description: The fake gun, if any, spawned and fired by the ranged mutation

message.title: Message
message.default: You fire off some of your quills.

mutation_category.description: The id of an mutation_category entry

mutation_type.description: The id of an mutation_type entry

martial_art.description: The id of an martial_art entry
